text: Three ships of the Hellenic Navy have borne the name Papanikolis (Παπανικολής), after the naval hero of the Greek War of Independence, Dimitrios Papanikolis: * , a French-built boat, in service 1927–1945 * , an ex-US GUPPY-IIA boat, in service 1972–1993 * , the first boat of the Type 214 submarine class, in service since 2010 Category:Hellenic Navy ship names Category:Set indices on ships
title: Greek submarine Papanikolis
